data.title: Donna Lee Larson Obituary 2015
data.meta_description: Donna Lee Larson, age 86, passed away December 18, 2015 at her daughters home in Persia, Iowa. She was born in Council Bluffs on January 25, 1929 to the late Floyd W. and Irene...
data.text: Donna Lee Larson, age 86, passed away December 18, 2015 at her daughters home in Persia, Iowa. She was born in Council Bluffs on January 25, 1929 to the late Floyd W. and Irene (Anderson) Larson. Donna graduated from Beebeetown High School with the class of 1946 and then attended college. She worked for over 28 years at Automation Inc., a subsidiary of AAA Insurance. Donna retired from Priority Inc. Donna is survived by her daughter and son-in-law, Cheryl Larson-Kear and Brent Kear; caregiver of many years, Margaret Gaines; grandchildren, Malia Mercier (Brian), Jason Mitchell (Rebecca), Donna Mitchell; 8 great grandchildren. Visitation is 6:00 p.m. to 8:00 p.m. on Monday at the Hoy-Kilnoski Funeral Home. Funeral service is 11:00 a.m. on Tuesday at the Omaha Memorial Seventh Day Adventist Church 840 North 72nd Street, Omaha, Nebraska. Memorials are suggested to Omaha Memorial Seventh Day Adventist Church.
